summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4650 for the improvement of the alley in Blocks 43 and 44, Law's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 1st Avenue West and 2nd Avenue West, from West Galer Street to West Garfield Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54049, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
